replies.body:
Can I have a list of champs you think are impossible to beat? So far I've seen threads/posts you made about;

Sejuani
Gragas
Sion
Evelynn
Blitzcrank
Rengar
Annie
Vayne
Ekko
Gnar
Nasus
Nidalee
Braum

and now Darius.

And that is just the first page when looking at your profile, do you understand how stupid you look? How about you just focus on getting better rather than just complaining every time someone plays better than you.

I seen the first name and stopped reading lol.

Who on earth think Sej is OP and impossible to beat?
did you just start playing like 20 minutes ago?

Gnar: after he does his op combo(its not op) he can't do shit for like 8 seconds unless he picks up the boulder or house
Nidalee: dodge spears
Sion: (is easy to kill but thats when you fear him)

"unless he picks up the boulder or house"

Not sure if serious. Drew picture anyway.

He can catch his boomerangs for a reduced cooldown but he doesn't have any interaction with walking on his Boulders or Houses, that's Olaf and his Axes.

> [{quoted}](name=KiStorm,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PzLpK6BT,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-06-30T21:47:01.541+0000)
>
> "unless he picks up the boulder or house"
> 
> Not sure if serious. Drew picture anyway.
> 
> He can catch his boomerangs for a reduced cooldown but he doesn't have any interaction with walking on his Boulders or Houses, that's Olaf and his Axes.

When gnar has his ult maxed his passive makes sure that if he picks up boomerang, houses or Boulders its CD his reduced my 50%

Didn't know that aye, only thought it applied to Boomerang. It's actually 60% CD reduc in Mega Gnar form for boulders and 45% CD +5% for each level in "GNAR" for boomerang when he catches/picks it up btw just checked wiki.

> [{quoted}](name=KiStorm,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PzLpK6BT,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-02T07:53:11.458+0000)
>
> Didn't know that aye, only thought it applied to Boomerang. It's actually 60% CD reduc in Mega Gnar form for boulders and 45% CD +5% for each level in "GNAR" for boomerang when he catches/picks it up btw just checked wiki.

well basically if Gnar is bout to transform he will do a lot for like .75 to 3secs max max then can't do shit till he gets boulder or boomerang
Mega Gnar.
ryze now too
Does anybody know then Darius will be playable again?
Why are you asking us? don't you have your own boards?
He's EUW Their servers probably down or not working.
Everyone celebrate toxic as f lane opponent is gone no more do we need skills in top lane and have to pick safe.

> [{quoted}](name=KiStorm,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PzLpK6BT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-28T09:44:08.669+0000)
>
> Everyone celebrate toxic as f lane opponent is gone no more do we need skills in top lane and have to pick safe.

Then you see the enemy laner picks Ryze.

Lol sad times playing against Ryze aye. All he does is farm and punish you if you try to trade with him. He's easy ganks though, Darius tends to turn around ganks a fair bit or at least make them less worthwhile as you'll most likely leave in severe pain even after you kill him.
I thought Ryze was on that general Ban this cause "op" list that everyone has.
Wait why is Darius being Disabled?
passive bug, wasn't dealing appropriate damage to the number of bleed stacks on the target.
Ah ok. thankyou.
Why did he winge about rengo?
